description: Code identifying the special rate condition used for time/labor or billing (e.g., weekend, holiday). Drives selection of alternate pricing rules for work performed.
Hourly billing or pay rate applied when the override condition is in effect. Stored as a numeric amount in the system currency.
Indirect/overhead rate applied with the override condition, used for burdening or cost allocation. Likely expressed as a percentage rather than a currency amount; confirm with SME.
Plain-language description of the override condition that explains when the special rate applies.
Boolean flag indicating the override is retired and should no longer be used in pricing or assignments.
System-generated unique identifier for the override record.
Factor multiplied by the applicable base rate during overtime under this override (e.g., 1.5 for time-and-a-half).
